traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the sergeant can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the sergeant that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sergeant makes two melee attacks with its trident.

actions.name: Trident
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Hooked Net
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 10/30 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a hooked net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.
